# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads: @threads, @spawn
using Base.Threads: nworkers

function pig_latinify(words)
    pig_latinized = similar(words)
    @threads for i in eachindex(words)
        word = words[i]
        if word != ""
            if ismatch(r"^(?:[aeiou]{1,}y|qu)$"i, word) # handle y at the end or qu in beginning
                pig_latinized[i] = "$wordway"
            elseif ismatch(r"^([^aeiou])", word) # move first consonant to end
                pig_latinized[i] = "$word$(word[1])$" + sub(r".", "", word) * "ay"
            elseif ismatch(r"^([aeiou])", word) # move first vowel to the end
                pig_latinized[i] = "$word$(word[1])$way"
            end
        end
    end
    return pig_latinized
end
```
